text.value: 9. Please enter the row number for this household from your sheet
10. Are you able to interview this house?

This household is either empty, unavailable or has refused.
Thank whomever you are speaking with, and finalize the form.
13. Are there children aged 5 to 14 years living in this household?

There are no school-aged children in this household.
Thank whomever you are speaking with and end the interview. Finalize the form.
Please read through the information sheet with the head of household or another responsible adult.
14. Has a resposible adult signed a consent form for the household to participate?

This household has not consented to participate.
Thank them and end the interview.
Finalize the form.
15. What is the name of the head of household?
16. How many girls aged 5 to 14 live in this household?
17. How many boys aged 5 to 14 live in this household?
Total of boys and gorls of the house
Before we discuss schistosomiasis, we have a few short questions about household.
E1. OBSERVATION ONLY - what are the wall materials of the household's main building?
E2. Does your household have electricity?
E3. Does any member of your household own a mobile phone?
W1. What is the main source of drinking water for members of your household?
Piped Water Into Compound, Yard Or Plot
Delivered Water By Cart With Small Tank / Drum
Surface Water (River, Stream, Dam, Lake, Pond, Canal, Irrigation Channel)
W1a. If answered other, please write what other is defined as:
W2. What is the main source of water used by members of your household for other purposes, such as cooking and hand washing?
Piped Water Into Compound, Yard Or Plot
Delivered Water By Cart With Small Tank / Drum
Surface Water (River, Stream, Dam, Lake, Pond, Canal, Irrigation Channel)
W2a. If answered other, please write what other is defined as:
W3. Where is your drinking water collected from?
W4. How long does it take to go there, get water and come back?
W4a. If answered Number in minutes please record the number of minutes below
W5. In the last month, has there been any time when your household did not have sufficient quantities of drinking water when needed?
S1. What kind of toilet facility do members of your household usually use?

text.id: /data/sanit_facil/Dry Pit Latrine Without Slab / Open Pit:label
text.value: Dry Pit Latrine Without Slab / Open Pit
Composting Toilet Twin Pit With Slab
Composting Toilet Twin Pit Without Slab
S1a. If answered other, please write what other is defined as:
S2. Do you share this facility with other who are not members of your household?
S3. Where is the toilet located?
S5. Has your (pit latrine or septic tank) ever been emptied?
S6. The last time it was emptied, where were the contents emptied to?

S6a. If answered other, please write what other is defined as:
H1. Where does your household usually wash clothes?
At Home (Using Piped Or Stored Water)
At The River, Stream Or Pond
H2. In the past year, has any member of your household earned money from fishing?
H3. In the past year, did any member of your household grow crops in land that was flooded?
H3. In the past year, did any member of your household grow crops in land irrigated by water other than rain? For example, from dug canals, using pumps, or manual watering with buckets?
Thanks for answering those questions. We can now move on to enroll the school aged children living in your household.

Individual questions for all SAC in the househould
All household members aged between 5 and 14 should be selected.
Do you want to add one child ?
Individual questions for all SAC in the househould
SAC1_5. Did this child / did you bathe, swim or play in nearby rivers, streams or ponds in the last week?
SAC1_6. Did this child / did you go fishing in nearby rivers, streams or ponds in the last week?
SAC1_7. Does this child attend school?
SAC1_8. Which school do they attend?
SAC1_9. If the school isn't included in the registry / is in a different district, please write the name given to you

Check that the subdistrict/community on the stickers are correct, and stick one to the consent sheet and a matching one on the lid of the pot.
ON THE NEXT SCREEN, SCAN THE STICKER ON THE POT BEFORE HANDING OVER TO THE CHILD. Provide instructions on how to collect the sample.
Scan the sticker on the sample pot before handing to the child.
Manually enter the FIRST three numbers on the sticker if you are unable to scan the sticker
Continue this form after the samples have been collected
SAC1_11. Please explain why you have not received a sample
